${modID}:ReadTheStars.NAME: Read the Stars
${modID}:ReadTheStars.DESCRIPTION: Scry !${modID}:CM!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Scry)
${modID}:ReadTheStars.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !${modID}:CM!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Scry)

${modID}:Intercept.NAME: Intercept
${modID}:Intercept.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:RayOfFrost.NAME: Ray of Frost
${modID}:RayOfFrost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, Stun it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RayOfFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, Stun it.

${modID}:WinterStorm.NAME: Winter Storm
${modID}:WinterStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is dealt unblocked damage, it loses that much Strength this this turn.

${modID}:Soulseeking.NAME: Soulseeking
${modID}:Soulseeking.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:FrostShards.NAME: Frost Shards
${modID}:FrostShards.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust a card from your hand.

${modID}:EMPulse.NAME: EM Pulse
${modID}:EMPulse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:CD! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !${modID}:CB!★ Block. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Damage and Block)
${modID}:EMPulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:CD! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !${modID}:CB!★ Block. NL Gain 1 Star. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Damage and Block)

${modID}:HarshLight.NAME: Harsh Light
${modID}:HarshLight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:CD! damage. NL Apply !${modID}:CM!★ Weak. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Damage and Weak)

${modID}:OpenReactor.NAME: Open Reactor
${modID}:OpenReactor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card from your discard pile. If you Exhaust a skill, gain 1 Strength.

${modID}:SpikedIceShell.NAME: Spiked Ice Shell
${modID}:SpikedIceShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL You gain [E] next turn.

${modID}:HyperspaceStrike.NAME: Hyperspace Strike
${modID}:HyperspaceStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have played no other cards this turn, deal !${modID}:D2! damage.

${modID}:AuroraVeil.NAME: Aurora Veil
${modID}:AuroraVeil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card next turn.
${modID}:AuroraVeil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

${modID}:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
${modID}:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! debuff from you. NL Draw 2 cards.
${modID}:Counterspell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! debuffs from you. NL Draw two cards.

${modID}:SearchTheSky.NAME: Search the Sky
${modID}:SearchTheSky.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card. NL Gain !M! temporary ${modID}:Star.
${modID}:SearchTheSky.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards. NL Gain !M! temporary ${modID}:Stars.

${modID}:HistoricAchievement.NAME: Historic Achievement
${modID}:HistoricAchievement.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. Retain it. NL Gain [E] [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:HistoricAchievement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. Retain them. NL Gain [E] [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PilotTraining.NAME: Pilot Training
${modID}:PilotTraining.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ThoroughStudy.NAME: Thorough Study
${modID}:ThoroughStudy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your discard pile and from your hand. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Offload.NAME: Offload
${modID}:Offload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card from your hand. If it cost 2 or more, add [E].
${modID}:Offload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card from your hand. If it cost 2 or more, add [E] [E].

${modID}:StructuralEngineering.NAME: Structural Engineering
${modID}:StructuralEngineering.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies and gain 1 ${modID}:Star.

${modID}:AstralSurvey.NAME: Astral Survey
${modID}:AstralSurvey.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain !M! temporary ${modID}:Star.

${modID}:WintersMidnight.NAME: Winter's Midnight
${modID}:WintersMidnight.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards from your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each card in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StarShower.NAME: Star Shower
${modID}:StarShower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemies !${modID}:CM! times. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases attacks)

${modID}:Timebomb.NAME: Timebomb
${modID}:Timebomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL At the start of your turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Infohazard.NAME: Infohazard
${modID}:Infohazard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand. NL Deal !D! damage X times. X is the Exhausted card's cost.

${modID}:QuantumBreakdown.NAME: Quantum Breakdown
${modID}:QuantumBreakdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL If this card is Exhausted, play it.

${modID}:EnergyGradient.NAME: Energy Gradient
${modID}:EnergyGradient.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL If this card is Exhausted, apply !${modID}:M2! Weak to ALL enemies. ALL enemies lose !${modID}:M2! Strength.

${modID}:SupergiantCharge.NAME: Supergiant Charge
${modID}:SupergiantCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you play a card with cost 4+, return this card from your discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:FrigidAtmosphere.NAME: Frigid Atmosphere
${modID}:FrigidAtmosphere.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, enemy loses !M! Strength and you gain !M! Strength. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:TimeStep.NAME: Time Step
${modID}:TimeStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your energy is conserved this turn. Retain your hand. NL End the turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TimeStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your energy is conserved this turn. Retain your hand. NL End the turn.

$modID}:VacuumEnergy.NAME: Vacuum Energy
$modID}:VacuumEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. Add a Dazed to the top of your draw pile. NL At the start of your next turn, gain !M! [E].

${modID}:LoseFocus.NAME: Lose Focus
${modID}:LoseFocus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! Dazed into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CosmicBeam.NAME: Cosmic Beam
${modID}:CosmicBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. Discard !M! card. NL If you have played no other cards this turn, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:HarmonicReplica.NAME: Harmonic Replica
${modID}:HarmonicReplica.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your discard pile. Add a copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FlickerEngineering.NAME: Flicker Engineering
${modID}:FlickerEngineering.DESCRIPTION: The next power you play this turn is played twice.

${modID}:GravitationalWave.NAME: Gravitational Wave
${modID}:GravitationalWave.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AstralTies.NAME: Astral Ties
${modID}:AstralTies.DESCRIPTION: Heal !${modID}:CM! HP. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Healing)

${modID}:ReachThroughAges.NAME: Reach Through Ages
${modID}:ReachThroughAges.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 1 card. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.
${modID}:ReachThroughAges.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 1 card. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck. NL Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card.

${modID}:LibraryResearch.NAME: Library Research
${modID}:LibraryResearch.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards of any color to add into your hand. It gains Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LibraryResearch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards of any color to add into your hand. It gains Exhaust.

${modID}:BathedInStarlight.NAME: Bathed in Starlight
${modID}:BathedInStarlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:CB! Block. NL Gain 1 ${modID}:Star. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Block)

${modID}:StarlightArmor.NAME: Starlight Armor
${modID}:StarlightArmor.DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, gain !${modID}:CB! Block. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Block.)
${modID}:StarlightArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, gain !${modID}:CB! Block. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Block Twice.)

${modID}:Hyperfocus.NAME: Hyperfocus
${modID}:Hyperfocus.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, lose !M! HP and gain [E].

${modID}:Overstimulation.NAME: Overstimulation
${modID}:Overstimulation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 fewer card and gain [E] [E].
${modID}:Overstimulation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 fewer card and gain [E] [E].

${modID}:ProtectionField.NAME: Protection Field
${modID}:ProtectionField.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have played no other cards this turn, gain [E] [E].
${modID}:ProtectionField.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have played no other cards this turn, gain [E] [E] [E].

${modID}:ToughItOut.NAME: Tough It Out
${modID}:ToughItOut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain [E] next turn.
${modID}:ToughItOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain [E] next turn. NL Innate.

${modID}:StellarFusion.NAME: Stellar Fusion
${modID}:StellarFusion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:CM! [E] next turn. NL Retain !M! cards. NL End the turn. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Energy)
${modID}:StellarFusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:CM! [E] next turn. NL Retain !M! cards. NL End the turn. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Energy)

${modID}:NullGeodesic.NAME: Null Geodesic
${modID}:NullGeodesic.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! cards, then exhaust 1 card.

${modID}:SubspaceRadiation.NAME: Subspace Radiation
${modID}:SubspaceRadiation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have 3 or more Exhausted cards, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:ADarkNight.NAME: A Dark Night
${modID}:ADarkNight.DESCRIPTION: Remove all ${modID}:Stars. Draw that many cards next turn. If !M! or more ${modID}:Stars were removed, deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:MemoriesOfPastSelves.NAME: Memories of Past Selves
${modID}:MemoriesOfPastSelves.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Gain [E]. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.
${modID}:MemoriesOfPastSelves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:GravitationalSingularity.NAME: Gravitational Singularity
${modID}:GravitationalSingularity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put this card on top of your draw pile. NL At the start of your next turn, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:HyperspaceArray.NAME: Hyperspace Array
${modID}:HyperspaceArray.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Scry !M!. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].

${modID}:Chronolog.NAME: Chronolog
${modID}:Chronolog.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust
${modID}:Chronolog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. NL Scry !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ParallelTimelines.NAME: Parallel Timelines
${modID}:ParallelTimelines.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next card is played twice. NL You lose 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:QuantumSuppression.NAME: Quantum Suppression
${modID}:QuantumSuppression.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain [E].

${modID}:UnwindTheSprings.NAME: Unwind the Springs
${modID}:UnwindTheSprings.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You lose 4 HP. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:UnwindTheSprings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You lose 4 HP. NL Gain 1 Intangible.

${modID}:StellarManifestation.NAME: Stellar Manifestation
${modID}:StellarManifestation.DESCRIPTION: Put !${modID}:CM! cards with ${modID}:Constellation from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Constellation (Increases Cards)

${modID}:AstralForm.NAME: Astral Form
${modID}:AstralForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !${modID}:CM! ${modID}:Stars. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Stars by 50%)
${modID}:AstralForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 ${modID}:Stars. At the start of your turn, gain !${modID}:CM! ${modID}:Stars. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Stars by 50%)

${modID}:EyerginSoda.NAME: Eyergin Soda
${modID}:EyerginSoda.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Energy is conserved between turns.

${modID}:Supernova.NAME: Supernova
${modID}:Supernova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:CD! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Damage twice.)
${modID}:Supernova.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:CD! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Damage 3 times.)

${modID}:PromisedGate.NAME: Promised Gate
${modID}:PromisedGate.DESCRIPTION: This turn, ALL cards you play are played twice. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GammaRayBurst.NAME: Gamma Ray Burst
${modID}:GammaRayBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${modID}:CM! Weak and !${modID}:CM! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Constellation (Increases Debuffs)

${modID}:Imaginaria.NAME: Imaginaria
${modID}:Imaginaria.DESCRIPTION: Play ALL cards in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Imaginaria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Play ALL cards in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SuperluminalJourney.NAME: Superluminal Journey
${modID}:SuperluminalJourney.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your exhaust pile into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SuperluminalJourney.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle any number of cards from your exhaust pile into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TemporalSingularity.NAME: Temporal Singularity
${modID}:TemporalSingularity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, take an extra turn after this one if this isn't an extra turn.
${modID}:TemporalSingularity.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the start of your turn, take an extra turn after this one if this isn't an extra turn.

${modID}:Nebula.NAME: Nebula
${modID}:Nebula.DESCRIPTION: This turn, gain twice as many ${modID}:Stars.
${modID}:Nebula.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, gain three times as many ${modID}:Stars.

${modID}:StellarAlignment.NAME: Stellar Alignment
${modID}:StellarAlignment.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a buff, deal !M! to ALL enemies.

${modID}:VacuumEnergy.NAME: Vacuum Energy
${modID}:VacuumEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Put a Daze on top of your draw pile. NL At the start of your next turn, gain [E] [E].
${modID}:VacuumEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Put a Daze on top of your draw pile. NL At the start of your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E].
